JobFullDesc: Product Support Operations (PSO) plays a critical role in the product lifecycle at Facebook, from ideation, to development, launch, growth, help, and support. The team partners closely with product, engineering, data science and global ops teams to improve the user experience and ensure that every product experience is safe, reliable, and supported at scale.Facebook is looking for an experienced leader to lead Data Operations within Product Support Operations.  Our team is responsible for building the next generation of Facebook’s products and foundational technology through data operations supporting products and platform solutions within Facebook’s AI, Facebook Reality Labs and signals based labeling for Ads & Business Products. These data operations include operations supporting labeling for machine learning, data annotation for product development, data collection for new hardware development and experiments for the future.  This individual will assume global leadership responsibilities in developing a leadership team of managers and enabling our global team of project managers to execute on ambitious operational and product delivery goals. This leader will drive cross-functional partnerships with product, engineering, and operations to improve product development, efficiency and scalability of our operations. Candidates will have strong judgment and a passion for improving the product experience for our global community of 3+ billion.
